        public LongTermCar(java.lang.String registration,
                   java.lang.String make,
                   java.lang.String model,
                   java.lang.Boolean isAvailable,
                   java.lang.Boolean isUnderRepair,
                   java.lang.Integer mileage,
                   java.time.LocalDate serviceDue,
                   TypeOfVehicle vehicleType,
                   java.lang.Boolean toBeSold)
        Constructor with pre-defined variables to create a LongTermCar through the super class' pre-define constructor
        Parameters:
        registration - The car registration (unique)
        make - The car's make
        model - The car's model
        isAvailable - Whether the car is available
        isUnderRepair - Whether the car is under repair
        mileage - The car's current mileage
        serviceDue - When the car's next service is due
        vehicleType - The type of vehicle being created (Enum)
        toBeSold - Whether the car is being sold
